subject: RE: Eugene PD - ALPR Cameras - 1014140
body:
Good morning Matthew,
 
No permits are needed to install EPD License Plate Readers. Please email brwillliams@eugene-or.gov brwillliams@eugene-or.gov   when the project will start . 
 
 
From: Matthew Yang <matt.yang@flocksafety.com> 
Sent: Tuesday, April 22, 2025 11:29 PM
To: WILLIAMS Byron R <BRWilliams@eugene-or.gov>; JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov>
Cc: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com>; Samantha Black <samantha.black@flocksafety.com>
Subject: Eugene PD - ALPR Cameras - 1014140
 
	You don't often get email from matt.yang@flocksafety.com. Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  
	
[EXTERNAL ?]
Hi Byron and Bret, 
 
Flock is working with the Eugene Police Department to install (48) License Plate Reader Cameras on their behalf. Per our conversations with Chief Skinner, they stated that no permits will be required, we just need to make sure we call in locates and coordinate with you two prior to installation. 
 
Looking for written confirmation that we can move forward with the locations listed in the attached excel sheet. Once I get that confirmation, we can start coordinating with you guys to schedule the installs and start calling for locates. 
 
-- 
	
 
Matthew Yang
Permitting Manager

 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 


 flocksafety.com 
	
 https://www.flocksafety.com/articles/flock-safety-secures-major-funding?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=Permitting&utm_medium=Wisestamp
